mapper.select: SELECT c.*, p.name as product_name, p.price as product_price, p.image_url FROM cart_item c LEFT JOIN product p ON c.product_id = p.id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY c.id DESC
SELECT * FROM cart_item WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND product_id = #{productId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart_item (user_id, product_id, quantity) VALUES (#{userId}, #{productId}, #{quantity})
mapper.update: UPDATE cart_item SET quantity = #{quantity} WHERE id = #{id}
